about.title: Trusted Car Rental Bandung
about.paragraph1: ALEXTRANS is a trusted Bandung car rental service provider with 24-hour service. We provide cheap Bandung car rental for various needs - both self-drive car rental (self drive) and rental with professional driver.
about.paragraph2: Our fleet includes Avanza, Innova, Alphard, Hiace, to Buses for families or groups. Suitable for Bandung city tour, tour packages, airport transfers, business trips, and family events.
about.paragraph3: With transparent prices starting from Rp 350,000/day, easy booking process via WhatsApp, and friendly service, ALEXTRANS is the main choice for car rentals in Bandung. We are ready to serve you anytime with well-maintained fleet and experienced drivers.

service_bandara.title: Jakarta Airport Transfer Soekarno-Hatta & Halim
service_bandara.description: Fast and comfortable Jakarta airport transfer service (Soekarno-Hatta & Halim Perdanakusuma). We are ready to pick up or drop you off at the airport on time. Various fleet options available from sedans to family cars. Professional drivers, flat rates, no hidden fees. Perfect your trip with trusted airport transfer service in Jakarta.

Suitable for families, groups, or personal trips. Flexible Bandung tour packages according to your needs - from natural tourism, culinary, to shopping. Friendly prices, unforgettable experiences.

testimonials.title: Customer Trust
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of customers have trusted our car rental service for safe and comfortable trips
testimonials.testimonial1_text: Rented Avanza for homecoming, the process was very easy via WA. The car was clean, AC was cold, and fuel efficient. Very satisfied, will definitely use Alextrans again.
testimonials.testimonial2_text: Used Hiace Commuter for family group to Lembang. The driver was friendly and knew the route, the car was spacious and comfortable. Recommended!
testimonials.testimonial3_text: Alphard for family event, the service was very premium. Luxurious interior, professional driver, on time. Worth it for important events.
testimonials.testimonial4_text: Innova Reborn for city tour, very satisfied. Well-maintained car, cold AC, and reasonable price. Responsive admin, fast booking process.
testimonials.testimonial5_text: Rush self-drive for weekend getaway, the car was great. Smooth engine, neat interior, no hassle survey. Thank you Alextrans!
testimonials.testimonial6_text: Fortuner for trip to Pangandaran, very comfortable and safe. Experienced driver, knew shortcuts. Satisfied with the service.
testimonials.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of our satisfied customers

faq.title: Questions About Bandung Car Rental
faq.subtitle: Important information about our car rental service
faq.question1: How much is Bandung car rental per day?
faq.answer1: Bandung car rental prices start from Rp 350,000/day for economical cars like Avanza. Prices vary depending on fleet type and rental duration. For minibuses like Hiace starting from Rp 600,000/day, with or without driver depending on the chosen package. Contact us for the best offer.
faq.question2: Is self-drive car rental without survey available?
faq.answer2: Yes, we provide Bandung self-drive car rental service without survey. Fast and easy process, just complete the documents (ID card, driver's license, family card) and collateral according to regulations. Perfect for those who want to drive themselves (self drive) with full flexibility.
faq.question3: How to book Bandung car rental?
faq.answer3: Booking is very easy! Contact us via WhatsApp at +62 813-1325-6756, or use the "Check Price" form on this website. Our team will respond quickly and help choose the right fleet for your needs. Booking process only takes a few minutes.
faq.question4: Is there a Bandung city tour package?
faq.answer4: Sure! We provide Bandung city tour packages with experienced drivers who know tourist routes. Popular destinations include Lembang, Dago, Kawah Putih, Tangkuban Perahu, and other tourist attractions. Packages can be customized to your needs and budget. Prices start from Rp 950,000 for 12 hours.
faq.answer5: Yes, we provide Soekarno-Hatta & Halim airport transfer service Jakarta 24 hours. The driver will pick up or drop you off on time. Flat price with no hidden fees. Airport transfer service is available for various types of fleet, from sedans to minibuses for groups.
faq.question6: Is Bandung car rental available 24 hours?
faq.answer6: Yes, our Bandung 24-hour car rental is ready to serve anytime. Our customer service is standby via WhatsApp to help your rental needs, both at night and on weekends. Booking can be done anytime according to your urgent needs.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? Contact us now!

about.paragraph2: All fleets are well-maintained, clean, air-conditioned, and always checked before use. Supported by professional drivers who are friendly, experienced, and understand Bandung routes to out of town well.
